Record.ClassificationPath: Respiratory Tract Diseases/Respiratory Tract Infections/Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome
Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Nidovirales Infections/Coronaviridae Infections/Coronavirus Infections/Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome
Record.Description: A viral disorder characterized by high FEVER, dry COUGH, shortness of breath (DYSPNEA) or breathing difficulties, and atypical PNEUMONIA. A virus in the genus CORONAVIRUS is the suspected agent.
